title: iPadOS 18 Beta 2 Includes Alternative App Stores and Other EU Changes
content:
Apple today announced that the second beta of iPadOS 18 extends alternative app marketplaces and other app-related changes in the EU to the iPad. The changes were first introduced on the iPhone in the EU with iOS 17.4 earlier this year.


The expansion of these changes to the iPad comes nearly two months after the European Commission said iPadOS is also a gatekeeper platform under the Digital Markets Act.

This story will be updated with more details.
Tags: App Store, European Commission
